feedback.title: Report a Bug
feedback.message_hint: Provide detailed information about the bug

auth.login_prompt: Login with Google to save your scores.
auth.login_description: You can log in to GeoGame by clicking the button below.
auth.check_email_confirmation: Check your e-mail to confirm the change
auth.name: Name
auth.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.name_too_short: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth.reset_password_desc: Enter your email to receive a reset link.

game_common.save_points_warning: Return to the main menu to save your score.
game_common.wrong_try_again: Wrong answer. Try again. Potential points:
game_common.options_hint: You can switch to 'Typing Mode' in the settings if you prefer.
game_common.not_found: Country not found, please select from the list.
game_common.score_system_generic: Scoring System: Your score starts at 50 each round; 10 points are deducted for every wrong guess.

game_capital.title: Capital Hunt
game_capital.description: Identify the country by its capital.
game_capital.content: Capital of the country to guess:
game_capital.input_hint: Which country is this the capital of?
game_capital.rule_welcome:
Welcome to the Capital City Quiz.
Your goal is to identify the country associated with a randomly selected capital from 250 countries.

game_flag.title: Flag Hunt
game_flag.description: Identify the country by its flag.
game_flag.rule_welcome:
Welcome to the Flag Quiz.
Your goal is to identify the country associated with a randomly selected flag from 250 countries.

game_distance.title: Distance Hunt
game_distance.description: Guess the country based on distance and direction.
game_distance.rule_welcome:
Welcome to the Distance Quiz.
Your goal is to find the randomly selected country from 250 options.
Distances may vary by ¬±100 km.
Locations are based on the geographic centers of the countries.
game_distance.rule_score:
Scoring System: Each round starts with 300 points. 10 points are deducted for every wrong guess.
After 15 guesses, the points earned are fixed at 100.

game_borderline.title: Borderline
game_borderline.description: Identify the country by its shape.
game_borderline.hint_scale: Country sizes have been scaled to fit the screen.
game_borderline.rule_welcome:
Welcome to the Shape Quiz.
Your goal is to identify a randomly selected country from 250 options by its shape.

game_borderpath.title: Border Path
game_borderpath.description: Reach the target by following border neighbors.
game_borderpath.rule_1: Go from the starting country to the target country
game_borderpath.rule_2: You can only cross through neighboring countries
game_borderpath.rule_3: Fewer moves mean a higher score!
game_borderpath.rule_4: Follow your path on the map
game_borderpath.no_neighbors_left: No neighboring countries left to move to!

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.load_error: Leaderboard could not be loaded. Please check your internet connection.

drawer.feedback_note: You can send your complaints or suggestions by clicking the button above.
drawer.creator: Creator: Kerem Kuyucu
